title: Nugatory DeFile
body:
Ranked Team Info:

Name: Nugatory Defile
Igt: INDFI


Requirements To Get Into Team:

Must be silver or above in solo queue
Must have skype or razer comm. (Skype preferred)
Must play regularly:

Monday - Friday: 7PM - Whenever

Saturday - Sunday: 12pm - Whenever

(This is in Australian time)

Must be level 30 ofcourse
Must be fully prepared:

Rune page setuped

Must be matured meaning no ragers or cry babies
Must have a huge champion pool and have a lot of the champions
Don't be greeeeeedy for kills please they get you killed!!!!!!!!!



Current Roster

Mid: Azerstorm
Top: (Vacant)
Jungle: Nyctis
Marksman: Fake5miles
Support: (Vacant)
Sub: (Vacant)


To apply
Please Set it up like this:


Ign: (Ingame Name)

Current Solo queue rank: (Silver or above)

Role: (Main)

Skype: (Yes or No)


Application Approval:

If you get a message from me via forums or a friend request on lol that means you

have been accepted to join the team and you will be invited to the team immediately.

I am sorry for does people who have applied and not accepted but there's a limited amount of people needed.

But if you really think you deserve to be in the team then you will need to convince me

through your application.

replies.body:
Ign: LuluTheSuppordle

Current Solo queue rank: S5 17lp

Role: Support and Jungle

Skype: Yes.

Ign: Matt 1000

Current Solo queue rank: G5

Role: Jg but can play all roles well and know how to play pretty much any champion to above average standard (check soloq stats)

Skype: Yes
